article_title: Feds mail important Obamacare subsidy tax form
article_text:
Total Access

Enjoy the convenience of home delivery plus Digital D. Sign up for our BEST VALUE today!

article_metadata.description: WASHINGTON — If you’re among the millions of consumers who got financial help for health insurance last year under President Barack Obama’s law, you should keep an eye on your mailbox. The administration said on Monday it has started sending out tax-reporting forms that you’ll need to fill out your 2014 return. Like W-2s for health care, they’re for people who got health-insurance tax credits provided under the law.
